Name: Chinese mother in law
About the game: This is a RPG game. You and your girlfriend are very much in love. When you and your girlfriend plan to get married, visit her parents. But her parents demanded a large 'betrothal gift'. For that, you have to make money. You can get money by killing enemies You can get money by working in a factory Money can be gained by exploring the remains of the battlefield
